name: City theft simulator
description:
City theft simulator.
Cool visual effects and nice graphics.
Different quests system, find and complete them all.
Fantastic weaponry selection.
With your great skills and agility you are going to be the greatest thief in the city. Bikes, cars, limos, hummers. You know no exceptions. You are the true car thief master.
Annoying gangsters, fearless mafia, mad yakudza. Show everyone who you are. Of course if you will stay alive.
Cop chases, military operations, bank rubbing and much more…
Join now!
